The Student Association Senate is considering  amendments to its bylaws to reflect the move to online elections.The  executive elections saw the SAs first use of online voting through HuskieLink a social media platform for student groups PERIOD Now.. PERIOD

This years Student Association executive election was a mess PERIOD It didnt need to be.The election devolved into battles between the Voice of Change ticket the Standing for Every Student ticket and the Board of Elections PERIOD The tickets accused each other.. PERIOD

The Student Association Supreme Court lifted executive election ticket Voice of Changes disqualification at a Tuesday hearing.The Voice of Change ticket was sanctioned by the SA Board of Elections for excessive litter of campaign material failure.. PERIOD

Forensics President Julia Boyle speaks to the Student Association Senate about Forensics going to the National Forensics Association National Championship and its need for supplemental funding during Sundays SA Senate meeting in the Holmes Student Center PERIOD The supplemental funding will pay for travel hotel stay meals entrance fee and coaching fee PERIOD

The Student Association should have done more to recruit candidates for this years executive elections.Executive elections will decide the SAs president vice president treasurer and student trustee PERIOD Students must attend a candidates meeting.. PERIOD

Students should vote in the Student Association executive elections so they can have representatives who will voice their opinions to NIU administrators.The SAs main job is to allocate  million in student fees to cover the needs of students PERIOD That.. PERIOD

The  Student Association executive election candidates have split into two tickets as campaigning continues in anticipation of the March  and  election.According to the SA bylaws campaign regulations candidates can choose to run in teams.The.. PERIOD

After a nearly 90minute debate on the effectiveness of online voting the Student Association Senate passed a bill  that would allow students to vote online for the SA executive election.Polling stations in DuSable Hall the Holmes Student Center.. PERIOD

Student Association Senator David White said he hopes to increase turnout to  students as the newly appointed SA election boards commissioner.As commissioner White is responsible for hiring poll workers administering elections holding a debate.. PERIOD

Administrators have agreed to allow for more student participation in program prioritization committees after pushback from the Student Association.An SA Senate resolution that had its first reading Feb PERIOD  stated the SAs diminishing faith in the.. PERIOD

Student Association Senator David White center speaks during Sundays SA Senate meeting in the Holmes Student Center PERIOD White had concerns about how student input will be used in program prioritization though NIU officials announced they will add two.. PERIOD

David White said community involvement has provided him with invaluable life experience.The senior political science major has been involved with organizations across campus as he seeks to gain more experience and he encourages other students to do the.. PERIOD
